#summary Connexions is a tagging/[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Folksonomy folksonomy] system similar to [http://del.icio.us/ del.icio.us], [http://www.simpy.com/ simpy], [http://www.furl.net/ furl], or [http://www.blinklist.com/ BlinkList].
#labels Featured

= Requirements/Dependencies =
A web server that supports [http://php.net/ PHP] (4 or higher), local .htaccess files, and the mod_rewrite URL rewriting engine.

A modern browser that supports javascript (1.5 or higher) and asynchronous HTTP requests.  This would include Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 or higher, Mozilla Firefox 1.0/Mozilla 1.7 or higher, and Apple Safari 1.2 or higher.

Connexions makes heavy use of the [http://www.prototypejs.org/ Prototype] javascript framework (version 1.5.0_rc0 or higher) and the [http://script.aculo.us/ Script.aculo.us] library built upon it (version 1.6.1 or higher) -- js/{prototype.js,scriptaculous}

In addition, the following are used:
  * js/[http://www.gadgetopia.com/autosuggest/ autosuggest.js]
  * js/[http://earthcode.com/blog/2005/12/jslog.html jslog.js]
  * lib/[http://adodb.sourceforge.net/ adodb]
  * lib/[http://code.google.com/p/freetag/ freetag]
  * lib/[http://pear.php.net/pepr/pepr-proposal-show.php?id=198 Services_JSON.php]
